衻字的基本解释

衻
rán
同“??”。

衻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rán］
［《廣韻》汝鹽切，平鹽，日。］
亦作“衻1”。
衣服的边缘。《仪礼·士昏礼》：“純衣纁袡。”郑玄注：“純衣，絲衣……袡，亦緣也。袡之言任也。以纁緣其衣，象陰氣上任也。凡婦人不常施袡之衣，盛昬禮，爲此服。”《礼记·杂记上》：“子羔之襲也，繭衣裳，與税衣纁袡爲一。”孔颖达疏：“纁，絳也。袡，裳下緣襈也。以絳爲緣，故云税衣纁袡也。”一说同“襜”。即蔽膝。陆德明释文引王肃曰：“袡，婦人蔽膝也。”

衻字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　衻； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1113第01
【唐韻】汝鹽切【集韻】【韻會】如占切，?音髥。【廣韻】衣緣也。　又【禮·喪大記】婦人復不以衻。【註】衻，婦人嫁時上服也。【儀禮·士昏禮】女次純衣纁衻。【註】衻之言任也，以纁緣其衣，象隂氣上任也。　又【類篇】衣下襈也。【禮·雜記】繭衣裳與稅衣，纁衻爲一。【註】裳，下襈也，婦人蔽膝也。【小爾雅】蔽膝謂之衻。　又【集韻】尼占切，音粘。義同。　又處占切。與襜、襝同。　【直音】作袡。【韻會】別作?。

衻字的源字形

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
衻字的起名意思

暂无。

衻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rán]
["Guangyun" Ru salt cut, flat salt, day. ]
Also known as "衻1".
The edge of the clothes. "Rituals and Shifu": "Pure clothes and 纁纁袡." Zheng Xuan's note: "Pure clothes, silk clothes ... chuck, also fate. The words of the chuck are also used. The clothes are the same as Yin Qi. . All women don’t often wear the robes of the chrysanthemum, and ceremonial rituals, for this." "Book of Rites·Miscellaneous Notes 1": "Zigao's attack also, cocoon clothes, and tax robes are one." Kong Yingdashu: "He, Crimson is also. Crimson, the lower margin of the clothes also. Because of the crimson, so the cloud tax clothing is also the same." The same as "Xu". That is to cover the knee. Lu Deming quoted Wang Su as saying: "Qu, women cover their knees."
衻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　衻; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1113 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Ru Yanqie [Jiyun] [Rhyme Hui] Such as Zhanqie,? Yin 髥. [Guang Yun] Yi Yuan also.　[Ritual·Mourning Records] The woman is no longer in the same way. [Note] Di, when a woman gets married, she also wears clothes. 【Rituals·Shiyun Li】The women's time is pure clothing and 纁衻. [Note] The words of the 衻衻 are no matter what, because they are bound to their clothes, like Yin Qi taking office.　[Classes] The clothes are under the clothes. 【Rite·Miscellaneous】Cocoon clothes and tax clothes are one. 【Note】Chang, underwhelming, and women covering their knees. [Little Erya] Covering the knees is called 衻.　[Jiyun] Nizhanqi, the sound is sticky. The same meaning.　Occupy and cut again. Same as 補 and 裣.　【Straight tone】As a line. [Rhyme Club] Don't make it?.
